mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.CONFIG_ID, t.TASK_DEF_KEY, t.ALIAS, t.DURATION, t.DURATION_UNIT, t.PERFORMER, t.BIND_FORM, t.GROUP_PERFORMER FROM WF_MOD_PROC_PROP t INNER JOIN WF_MOD_PROC_CONFIG t1 ON t1.ID = t.CONFIG_ID WHERE t1.PROC_DEF_ID =#{processDefinitionId} AND t1.MODULE_ID =#{moduleId} AND t.TASK_DEF_KEY =#{taskDefKey}
SELECT RES.* FROM ACT_ID_USER RES WHERE RES.ID_ = #{performer} ORDER BY RES.ID_ ASC
SELECT RES.* FROM ACT_ID_GROUP RES WHERE RES.ID_ = #{group_performer} ORDER BY RES.ID_ ASC
